languages.text: {n}Неподалеку лежит бездыханное тело освобожденного вами из клетки ласеракса "Номер 4". Шерсть слиплась от крови, хищные глаза подернуты мутной пленкой. Отдать свою жизнь за другого — поразительно человечный поступок для зверя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Неподалеку лежит бездыханное тело освобожденного вами из клетки ласеракса "Номер 4". Шерсть слиплась от крови, хищные глаза подернуты мутной пленкой. Отдать свою жизнь за другого — поразительно человечный поступок для зверя.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неподалеку лежит бездыханное тело освобожденного вами из клетки ласеракса "Номер 4". Шерсть слиплась от крови, хищные глаза подернуты мутной пленкой. Отдать свою жизнь за другого — поразительно человечный поступок для зверя.{/n}

{n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of the lacerax you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, and its rapacious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another is a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

{n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

languages.text: {n}近くには、ケージから解き放たれた「四番目」のラセラックスの動かぬ亡骸が横たわっていた。血で毛並みは固まり、粘りつくように濡れ、獰猛な目には光がなかった。他者を守るために自分の命を捧げるという行動は、この獣にしては驚くほど人間的なものだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}近くには、ケージから解き放たれたラセラックスの動かぬ亡骸が横たわっていた。血で毛並みは固まり、粘りつくように濡れ、獰猛な目には光がなかった。他者を守るために自分の命を捧げるという行動は、この獣にしては驚くほど人間的なものだった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hemen yakınında, kafesinden saldığın "Dördüncü" laseraksını cansız bedeni yatıyor. Tüyleri kanla yapışmış ve kümelenmiş, vahşi gözleri donuklaşmış. Başkasını korumak adına hayatını feda etmesi, bir canavara göre şaşırtıcı derecede insani bir davranış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hemen yakınında, kafesinden saldığın "Dördüncü" laseraksını cansız bedeni yatıyor. Tüyleri kanla yapışmış ve kümelenmiş, vahşi gözleri donuklaşmış. Başkasını korumak adına hayatını feda etmesi, bir canavara göre şaşırtıcı derecede insani bir davranış.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cerca de ti yace el cuerpo sin vida del lacerax «Número 4» al que liberaste de su jaula. La sangre ha convertido su pelaje en matas pegajosas y sus ojos están vidriosos. Sacrificar su vida para proteger otra es un acto extraordinariamente humano para una bestia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cerca de ti yace el cuerpo sin vida del lacerax «Número 4» al que liberaste de su jaula. La sangre ha convertido su pelaje en matas pegajosas y sus ojos están vidriosos. Sacrificar su vida para proteger otra es un acto extraordinariamente humano para una bestia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}被你从笼子里放出来的“四号”异虎，如今倒在了地上，冰冷的尸体没有一丝生机。它身上沾满了粘稠的血迹，凶狠的双眼也彻底失去了神采。对这样的野兽而言，拼死保护他人的行为着实令人动容。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}被你从笼子里放出来的“四号”异虎，如今倒在了地上，冰冷的尸体没有一丝生机。它身上沾满了粘稠的血迹，凶狠的双眼也彻底失去了神采。对这样的野兽而言，拼死保护他人的行为着实令人动容。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Non loin de là gît le corps sans vie du lacérax « numéro 4 » que vous aviez délivré de sa cage. Son pelage est collé par le sang poisseux, et un voile recouvre ses yeux féroces. Sacrifier sa propre vie pour protéger autrui est un acte étonnamment humain pour une bête de ce genre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Non loin de là gît le corps sans vie du lacérax « numéro 4 » que vous aviez délivré de sa cage. Son pelage est collé par le sang poisseux, et un voile recouvre ses yeux féroces. Sacrifier sa propre vie pour protéger autrui est un acte étonnamment humain pour une bête de ce genre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Neben dir liegt der leblose Kadaver von Lacerax "Nummer 4", den du aus seinem Käfig befreit hast. Sein Fell ist blutverklebt, und alles Leben ist aus seinen bösartigen Augen gewichen. Ihr Leben zu opfern, um ein anderes zu schützen, war für eine Bestie erstaunlich menschlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Lying nearby is the lifeless body of lacerax "Number 4," which you released from its cage. Its fur is clumped and sticky with blood, its vicious eyes glazed over. Giving its own life to protect another was a stunningly human act for a beast.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Neben dir liegt der leblose Kadaver von Lacerax "Nummer 4", den du aus seinem Käfig befreit hast. Sein Fell ist blutverklebt, und alles Leben ist aus seinen bösartigen Augen gewichen. Ihr Leben zu opfern, um ein anderes zu schützen, war für eine Bestie erstaunlich menschlich.{/n}
